title: Remote workers are on the move… to the suburbs
description:
As cities throughout the US lift Covid-19 restrictions, many Americans are looking for remote work opportunities. Could distance from the office usher in an economic revival for small cities and rural areas? Recode’s Rani Molla (@ranimolla) talks with Mark Muro from the Brookings Institution about his latest research on this topic.

References: 

Read Rani’s story here. 

Read Mark’s report here.

itunes:title: Remote workers are on the move… to the suburbs
itunes:author: Recode
itunes:subtitle: America is ready for a return to the office, but are workers? The latest data shows that most people would like to continue working remotely in some capacity, even if employers are not meeting those expectations.
